attributes.action: Make it law that paedophiles get tougher sentences
attributes.additional_details: Guarantees that convicted paedophiles get longer sentences in order to protect the children of this country. During 2010/2011 17,727 sexual crimes against children were recorded in England and Wales. We propose that this law be named "Poppi's law" in memory of Poppi Worthington.
